name: Pig Pinball
description:
Pinball with various unique game modes including genre hybrids and mashups such as a cross between pinball and breakout. Many more game modes are incoming!

Game Modes
  • Standard
  • Brick Buster
  • Pig Farm (work in progress)

All game modes have at least one pig ball.

Standard

Currently standard mode is normal pinball with turrets constantly firing at your ball.

Brick Buster

Pinball mixed with breakout.

Pig Farm (work in progress)

This game mode will essentially be about raising pigs on a pinball table. You will be able to go into the pinball field table to capture wild pigs to raise on the farm table. There are some interesting ideas on the pipeline. Hope you guys like them when they come out. :)

Fun Options Acid Mode

In any game mode (and even the main screen) you can activate Acid mode in the settings menu. You will instantly experience what it's like to see through the eyes of a hallucinogenic drug user. Feedback welcome. :)

General State of the Current Version

This game is currently in alpha and is actively being worked on. Expect to find bugs and incomplete features. Feedback and ideas from the community are always welcome!

Pricing

The initial launch of the alpha version will be "pay what you want to support development". Overtime, the minimum price will increase as the game becomes more polished and more features are added. The price will be fixed once the game officially releases. Buying the game before it is finished will essentially give you a discount compared to the full price on launch day.
